verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3050><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh! <S%H3050><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> him, <S%H5650><s%> you servants of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%>
you who stand <S%H5975><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> in the courts <S%H2691><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%>
Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah, <S%H3050><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3050><s%> is good. <S%H2896><s%> Sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to his name, <S%H8034><s%> for that is pleasant. <S%H5273><s%>
For Yah <S%H3050><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for himself; <S%H3478><s%> Israel for his own possession. <S%H5459><s%>
For I know <S%H3045><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is great, <S%H1419><s%> that our Lord <S%H3068><s%> is above all gods. <S%H430><s%>
Whatever Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> pleased, <S%H2654><s%> that he has done, <S%H6213><s%> in heaven <S%H8064><s%> and in earth, <S%H776><s%> in the seas <S%H3220><s%> and in all deeps; <S%H8415><s%>

who causes the clouds <S%H5387><s%> to rise <S%H5927><s%> from the ends <S%H7097><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> who makes <S%H6213><s%> lightnings <S%H1300><s%> with the rain; <S%H4306><s%> who brings <S%H3318><s%> forth the wind <S%H7307><s%> out of his treasuries; <S%H214><s%>
Who struck <S%H5221><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> both of man <S%H120><s%> and animal; <S%H929><s%>
Who sent <S%H7971><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you, <S%H4714><s%> Egypt, on Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and on all his servants; <S%H5650><s%>
who struck <S%H5221><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> and killed <S%H5221><s%> mighty <S%H7227><s%> kings, <S%H4428><s%>
Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> and all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%>
and gave <S%H5414><s%> their land <S%H776><s%> for a heritage, <S%H5159><s%> a heritage <S%H5159><s%> to Israel, <S%H3478><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>
Your name, <S%H8034><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> endures forever; <S%H5769><s%> your renown, <S%H2143><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> throughout all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>
For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will judge <S%H1777><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> and have compassion <S%H5162><s%> on his servants. <S%H5650><s%>
The idols <S%H6091><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> are silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>'s hands. <S%H3027><s%>
They have mouths, <S%H6310><s%> but they can't <S%H1696><s%> speak. They have eyes, <S%H5869><s%> but they can't <S%H7200><s%> see.
They have ears, <S%H241><s%> but they can't <S%H238><s%> hear; neither is there <S%H3426><s%> any breath <S%H7307><s%> in their mouths. <S%H6310><s%>
Those who make <S%H6213><s%> them will be like them; <S%H982><s%> yes, everyone who trusts in them.
House <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> praise <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> House <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> praise <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%>
House <S%H1004><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> praise <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> You who fear <S%H3373><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> praise <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> from Zion, <S%H6726><s%> Who dwells <S%H7931><s%> at Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3050><s%>
